sentences.english: Hot summer days are coming while the high-grade summer goods will raise another heat wave.
sentences.chinese: 伏天将临，夏日精晶将掀起又一个热季狂潮。

sentences.english: The Honolulu Blue Guest Room is a cozy cool escape from the summer sun.
sentences.chinese: 檀香山蓝色客房舒适凉爽，适合躲避夏日艳阳。

sentences.english: Swimming is Hong Kong's most popular summer pastime.
sentences.chinese: 游泳是香港人最喜爱的夏日康乐活动。

sentences.english: Although I like the seeds of spring, lingering summer lotus.
sentences.chinese: 虽然，我喜欢春日的萌芽，留恋夏日的荷花。

sentences.english: This The last rose of summer, left blooming alone;
sentences.chinese: 夏日最后的玫瑰，入秋犹自红。

sentences.english: The plant is leafing out in the summer sun.
sentences.chinese: 这株植物在夏日的日光中长叶子。

sentences.english: Summer heat, has been out of bud and leaf stems.
sentences.chinese: 夏日炎炎，芽已抽出茎和叶。

sentences.english: The summer storm laid the crops.

sentences.english: In summer days when the trees grow fast, temperature is relatively low and heat unadequate.
sentences.chinese: 而夏日林木生长旺季则气温较低，热量欠缺。

sentences.english: The nudists will enjoy their beautiful summer day at the resort of Usedom.
sentences.chinese: 游客将在乌塞敦的裸体村庄内度过夏日惬意的一天。

sentences.english: This is the third successive summer of big anti-Indian protests.

sentences.english: The night of hot and dry, the breeze takes several heats of silk summers.
sentences.chinese: 燥热的夜晚，风带着几丝夏日的热。

sentences.english: A stiff wind howled from the west, thankfully warmed by the summer sun.
sentences.chinese: 冷硬的风从西边呼啸过来，感谢夏日的阳光温暖着它。

sentences.english: It is famous for its sunny, pleasant summer and long golden beaches.
sentences.chinese: 它以阳光明媚的怡人夏日和长长的金海岸而闻名。

sentences.english: Summer Wind also added a little power, it is more merry dance of the.
sentences.chinese: 夏日的风又加了一点力量，它舞得更欢快了。

sentences.english: After a rainy winter , a plentiful summer.
sentences.chinese: 多雨的冬日，就有丰收的夏日。
